results.title: Senior Mine Manager
results.description: One of the largest platinum mining companies is looking for a Senior Mine Manager to be based in Limpopo. Candidates are also required to have a minimum of 10 years experience in an underground mining environment. Candidates must have at least 3 years experience as a Mine Manager.
